mapper.insert: insert into sns_user(user_email, user_name, user_pw, user_phone, user_rdate, user_img, user_key) values ( #{user_email}, #{user_name}, #{user_pw}, #{user_phone}, #{user_rdate}, #{user_img}, #{user_key} )
mapper.select: select user_email AS user_email, user_name AS user_name, user_rdate AS user_rdate from sns_user where user_email = #{user_email}
